EmailTemplate.name: 2017_Global_Nurture_Jetwave_ATR.201710_Global_Email_Jetwave_ATR_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: What’s the Word on The Street? Better Inflight Wi-Fi! ✈️
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> What Do Passengers Really Think About Inflight Wi-Fi? <[[https://youtu.be/qvFnC4mSI6w]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}}, Honeywell took to the streets of New York City to find out what passengers really think about inflight Wi-Fi. And the word <[[https://youtu.be/qvFnC4mSI6w]]> is clear – current connectivity options are disappointing, unreliable and spotty.
Airline passenger desires are simple - check email, listen to music and watch videos wherever they fly. We want the freedom to stay connected! Honeywell’s JetWave™ system, which exclusively powers Inmarsat’s Ka-band GX Aviation service, can do just that. So why not give your customers what they want.
READY TO GET CONNECTED? <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/Honeywell-JetWave-Provides-High-Speed-Connectivity-Globally]]>
